solution_line_template: Mon, Wed, Fri she gets a ${creamsicle_cost_per_day} orange creamsicle so that's {creamsicle_days_per_week} days * ${creamsicle_cost_per_day}/day = $<<{creamsicle_days_per_week}*{creamsicle_cost_per_day}={creamsicle_weekly_cost}>>{creamsicle_weekly_cost}

Tue and Thur she gets a ${sandwich_cost_per_day} ice cream sandwich so that's {sandwich_days_per_week} days * ${sandwich_cost_per_day}/day = $<<{sandwich_days_per_week}*{sandwich_cost_per_day}={sandwich_weekly_cost}>>{sandwich_weekly_cost}

Sat and Sun she gets a ${nutty_buddy_cost_per_day} nutty-buddy so that's {nutty_buddy_days_per_week} days * ${nutty_buddy_cost_per_day}/day = $<<{nutty_buddy_days_per_week}*{nutty_buddy_cost_per_day}={nutty_buddy_weekly_cost}>>{nutty_buddy_weekly_cost}
